content.detailedDescription: we were on a country road selling a microwave oven to a customer when dan asked me to go out to the car and fetch his briefcase.  when i exited the house a car was stopped on the road with a female occupant stareing in my direction.  i walked up to her car and she was looking through me like i wasn't there. i turned and about 200 yards was a disc metallic object hovering just above the tree line.  i leaned against her car and was observing it for about 7-10 minutes.  dan cracked the door, and hollerred for his demo case.  i took it in and when we were done he said, what was i doing and i told him i was watching a flying saucer.  he laughed, he thought i was flirting with that woman. later ed and i were in the same area, and we found an airstrip on a country road surrounded by razor wire and even a tower.  i realy feel it is kept there.  i couldn't even find the strip on google earth.  so i know in crawford county pa there is an installation that dosen't exist, which should be looked into. someone spent one hell of alot of money if it is private.  why the razor wire?  i heared somewhere in southern pa was ufo deal.  i know what i saw, and i was stone sober, and it was a clear day.     jh
content.summary: Clear visibilty/ other witness/ hovered/ silent.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was walking up the driveway after opening the gate for our room-mate to come onto our property after work. he always looks up at the sky at night and these "lights" caught his eye. he called me outside at 11:26 pm to point out to me that there were 3 differt objects in the sky. they were going in circles, up, down, zig-zagging, in close, out far, left to right all at an incredible speed. we could also see lights fading in and out. bright white, green, red, yellow and blue. we talked about it being an airplane, helicopter or weather ballon but knew that there was no way that anything man-made could travel like these were. we watched it until our room-mate got home about 18 minutes later and pointed it out to her to see if she could see them too, she saw them immediately. we watched for another 11 minutes or so and they started to fade as if they were travelling away from us again at a high rate of speed. then, they were gone. we felt excited, scared and knew that nobody would believe us. we even talked about being abducted and loosing time. nothing could have changed direction as fast as these objects did. we have had other sightings in our area but none as long as this lasted. we have giant power lines just east of our home that run from phoenix to las vegas with hoover dam in the middle. there is an incredible amount of electricity in these lines. enough so you can hear the electricity travelling through them. people have said that the ufos come so they can drain power from these lines. it is not the first time we have seen this and it probably won't be the last. we don't have a video camera so there are no pictures.
content.summary: Saw 3 objects going in all different directions at a high rate of speed. distinct patterns.

content.detailedDescription: Well my girl frend and i went to the st louis arch on our vacation and it was about 10 at night we looked up and noticed something strange and took a pic of it might have lasted about 2 min we have a photo of it during and one right after when it seemed to just have vanashed when it was thare it apeired to be rotating witch you can clearly see in the photo
content.summary: Saw ufo while on vacation in stl

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:40am i awoke from a disturbed sleep with the need to urinate. went to the wc (which is located next to the sleeping/living area - i currently live in a university staff dormitory room. after urinating i poured myself a glass of water. my partner (girlfriend) had stayed the night but awoke and immediately complained of having had a bad dream. i asked about the dream. she said she had dreamt she had been 'examined' by 'ufo' people  - indicated where by pointing to her mid-torso region at the base of the ribs on her right-hand side (if looking at her face-on). i quickly asked her what kind of examination and she said, "stuck a needle in me." surprised and bewildered by what she had said i immediately turned toward the window (the only window in the room) with the intention of looking out the window - i was thinking half-heartedly that perhaps a ufo would be hovering somewhere nearby - we had discussed ufos and aductions earlier that evening. the window faces in a southly direction. i live on the top floor of this five floor dormitory building - unobstructed views (mostly) of the southern sky. the instant i got to the window and looked out i saw the object in the upper right-hand corner of the sky. it was very bright (against a pre-dawn sky - dawn at this latitude and time of the year happens around 3:30am). in fact, it was bigger and brighter than a satelite (which i see as smaller dots of light when viewed in the night sky over this city). in fact, it was bigger and brighter than venus (at least i think it's venus), which can be viewed at this time of the year (from around 8pm low in the western sky and tracks slowly across the sky to the east). the object moved swiftly across the sky - no faster than a jet airliner would (at that altitude). i immediately yelled to my partner to come to window and see the object. she got to the window in time to see it for about 4 or 5 seconds before it disappeared out of sight (passed behind the dormitory building opposite mine). we stood stunned and amazed. upon seeing the object (though i had half-heartedly expected to see a ufo) i first thought it was a satelite, but quickly realised it could not have been because of its altitude - lower than a jet airliner track (because jet airliners 1) do not pass so low over this city and 2) it was not following the usual jet airliner track over the city - east to west or west to east track. i guessimated its altitude as low because it passed through the rising vapours of a nearby medicine factory (the vapours are similar with those of a power plant); the medicine factory is approximately 3 kms from my dormitory building - in a s.S.E. direction. the object passed through the vapours not behind them like it would if it were higher than those vapours.
content.summary: Crossed the sky from n.E. to s.E.

content.detailedDescription:
around 9:45 pm and 10:00 pm we noticed a light comming from the west over the hills of

 shadysde, ohio. it traveled extremely fast compared to the jets that fly over us a high

 altitudes. i venture to say it was under 10,000 feet twice as big as the north star.

 and it proceeded to go in a straight line to the east kept same speed through out our observation. their was no sound attached to the object it had no flashing lights whatsoever.

but, kept in a easternly direction till over the hills beside our town.

noticed from the back sde of the object light became dim.

 

 we are located 12 miles south of wheeling, wv on rt # 2 and next to glendale,wv.

 across from us to the east is shadyside, powhaten and bellaire, ohio.

 

 wanted to let you know what we saw.

 i was hot in the apt so we sat outside that's when we saw it.

 we weren't shook because my wife ai talk of this regularly

  i'm a student of mr. william lyne who studies saucers.

 

 according to rense program it's been seen in pa.
content.summary: Came over by house

content.detailedDescription: I recorded the espn2 broadcast of the nhra denver drag race, ran on the weekend of july 12th. in the opening credits, there is a pamoramic view of the local area with a large mountain. as you can easily see, some thing at incredable speed streaks across the sky, in the upper right corner. in slow motion it appears to be cone shaped, silver, and ingulfed in a vapor trail.
content.summary: Caught on tape

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were outside smoking a cigarette at roughly 11 pm. it was a very clear sky and i was pointing out to my brother how well you could see the stars, when i noticed one of the stars slowly moving across the sky. the object, which at the time i figured to be a satellite, movied across the sky very slowly, and within one minute it had moved from one side of the sky to another. the strange thing about the object was that it was the exact same brightness and size of almmost all of the other stars ion the sky that night. it didn't make any hairpin turns or anything to that effect, but it was strange nonetheless. i would love to know if anyone else saw this object, and if not if there was any known satellite in the sky at that time. just looking for an answer as to what was in the sky that night.
content.summary: Fast-moving object seen high above the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Hi i have tryed to describe a sitting to your web site to no avail i'm sure you woulb be interested in what i have to say please contact me i have photos and witesses .
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
On july 14th 2008 around 11:45p.M. my girlfriend and i were outside in my backyard on my deck smoking a cigarette and just basically looking at the stars in the night sky. we were facing west when a star in the southern part of the sky caught my attention, it appeared to me to be moving all of sudden. i asked my girlfriend if she could see it moving and she agreed that it was. i first thought it may be a satellite, the star like object began moving north, at this point from my viewpoint it was like 3 or 4 houses down from my backyard. i then told my girlfriend to keep an eye on it as i was going to run and get the camera. when i returned outside the object was now directly over my house, i snapped about 7 pictures using a casio exilim 7.2 mega pixel camera hoping to catch the object. i also took a short movie after pictures hoping to catch this on film. at that point the star like object either disappeared, or went like back up into space, because as soon as i began to take the pictures the star like object dimmed out, basically like someone just unscrewed a light bulb is the best way i can describe it. we then both noticed that there were random flashes in the sky, one to west, one to the north and then one the south, around the same part of the sky above that we had just witnessed this star like object just fizzle out. then searching the sky in hopes of seeing the object again, i witnessed a shooting star. 3 anomalies in time span of about 7 minutes. we then went through the pictures and the movie and discovered that we did catch something on one of the pictures but none of the rest or the movie. i have no idea what it is. 

in the picture, the star like object is middle left. a normal star is seen in the picture on the lower right.
content.summary: Stationary starlike object moves across sky then dims out

content.detailedDescription: It was like everyday i am walking in park and enjoying cool & clear weather of winter. i just saw sky because i like to watch stars  but that day i saw flag kide of lighr on the north west side in sky its not small like star but it is clear and continus shining on that same spot. first i thought that it must be any satilite but then after 10min i feel strange about that because nobody cannot saw satilite by eyes and also it mut not as big as that object yes it is a strange object. but i dont understand what to do for it so i kepp silent.I was there for 45min & that object i saw for 40 to 44min atlist continusly.Please do help me out to find what is it was? was it any ufo?
content.summary: It was like flag lighting but in rectagular shape lighting in sky

content.detailedDescription: From the beginning...We went camping in deep northern ontario.  at dusk, i took out the camera and tried to get some pics of the fire and perhaps some strange shapes in the fire.  took a few pics and some around the camp site, then put the camera away.  about an hour later, i saw some strange lights across the lake.  the lights were strange because there is nothing on the other side of the lake and all the boats were in.  the lights were just above the tree line on the other side of the lake.  i watched them dance around for awhile, then took out the laser pen and they seem to be responding to it.  i would get an occasional flash of green light back at me like a laser.  there was no sound.  i was playing with the lights for about an hour and then went to bed.  i quickly fell asleep and my wife says shortly thereafter, the tent was lit up with lights.  indeed the entire camp site was lit up.  the next morning i asked the park warden, what was on the other side of the lake.  he said nothing and nobody was on the other side of the lake.  there is no developement, roads, or towers on the other side of the lake.  i asked if anyone was hiking around the lake.  he said absolutely not.  the trail that goes around the lake takes about a week to ten days to travel and anyone attempting to take this trail, must report to the park warden before attempting it.  nobody would dare attempt this trail without letting other folks know where they are.  after we arrived home, i downloaded the vacation pictures on the computer and to my surprise, i actually got a picture of the lights.  i was totally amazed since i never tried to actually get the picture, i just got luckey.  we have reserved our same spot on the same day, (aug.22) in the hopes of seeing the strange lights again.  this next time we are bringing, not only the camera, but the telescope, and binoculars, and tape recorder.  if you can advise me what else would be good to take, i would greatly appriciate it.  you are also invited to join us if you like.  bring your own tent.  :)  p.S. contact me if you would like to view the pic i got from last year.
content.summary: I was hitting the lights across the lake with my pen laser for about an hour, then they came to our camp.

content.detailedDescription: Mom,wife and i where siiting on the back deck chatting. the sky was slight haze with an almost full moon behind me. there was less than a hundred stars visable in my line of sight. i noticed a bright star size light moving from my left horizon to directly overhead and then faded at about a 45 degree of my right side line of sight. this all occured in aproxamatley 15 seconds. another similar light came from the same direction and headed behind the front part of the house. not sure of my north\south coordinates in this area. have no idea what it was, never seen anything move across the sky like that. the light was solid white in color with slight orange as it faded away. there was planes flying in the area with very noticeable becons flashing. all three of us witnessed it.
content.summary: 2 sightings of star like light at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I live by rohrman park in schererville.  four times in the past seven nights 9pm and 10pm i observed an odd-looking flying object that moves in a bizarre fashion.  for example, last night it was traveling fairly slowly from the south to north, stopped, then ascended in altitude, then it appeared to abruptly fall from the sky (landing in what appeared to be southwest of rohrman park.  it has an orange glowing halo around it and looks like a lit hot air balloon, however, hot air balloons do not fly that high and i have never seen one that late at night.  i just wanted to let you know since i would like to see a story about so i can eventually find out what it is.  i live on autumn dr (in schererville, but with a crown point address) and many of my neighbors have seen the same thing.
content.summary: Object moves in bizarre fashion and descends

content.detailedDescription:
On the 17th of july 2008 i was on the front porch and seen an object mooving from the moon to the east then disapeared i though it was a star covered by clouds. on the night of the 18 july 2008 my wife was outside and told me to get the camera and come to her i went to the front porch and took pictures of the object mooving past the moon. it was mooving at a good speed then stoped then mooved again at the same speed. after 2mins it disapered.
i could not make out a shape of the object it was a bright light ive seen a lot of craft in the ski i spent 26 years in the military and am a trained observer, i know it was not a star or the space station or plane that we have at preasent. i have noticed that a lot of "ufo" activity in the past 3 years. we have seen cigar and triangle types moving over in the day time, maby this is all part of it.
content.summary: Seen a light in the sky mooving thoward the moon and then past it thenit vanashed

content.detailedDescription:
1st - driving west on route 151 approaching elliot rd. at the horizon moving south to north was a very bright, too fast to be a plane, light. approximately 500 to 1000 ft up. looked to be close enough to be crossing luther rd itself, but may've been a trick of perspective and was actually farther away. if that is the case then the object obviously had to be moving even faster than it appeared.
one witness.

2nd - approximately between midnight and 1 a.M. behind quigley's restaurant in east greenbush ny on routes 9 and 20 (after only having one beer). again, object moving south to north directly overhead. meteor or comet style of movement without a tail. very bright, white and green with a "burning" type of look to it as if it was something that burned green as it entered the atmosphere. (copper? magnesium?)
arcing type of movement--it was however moving away from us--it was a very large ball. as it neared the end of it's path it gave the impression of turning, then disappeared. i'd venture an altitude of less than 2000 ft. with a duration of 2-4 seconds.
two witnesses, we were talking behind the bar when i caught the movement out of the corner of my eye as the object came into view above the roof of the building. i turned quickly to follow it's path, exclaiming "what the hell is that?!" other witness stood there, mouth agape, reacted once it disappeared.

i know the bootid meteor shower was scheduled for two days later, but green is a color i was not accustomed to seeing. that and the altitude of these events seemed incongruous to a shower.
content.summary: 2 events - meteorish but not quite

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Driving down 413, i spotted a craft that seemed unusual. it was up in the sky coming from the left.  i noticed that it had white lights in the front and it was flying towards me. as it got closer, i rolled down my window and noticed that it made no noise and as i watched it fly past me i could see the outline of the remainder of the craft behind the lights. and underneath the craft i could see a series of small red and white lights blinking. i tried to pull off to the side of the road to take a picture. however, by the time i did do that, the craft had flown over the trees and out of sight. i did however draw a sketch of what i saw. 

this was not the first time i had seen this craft in the same exact place. four years prior, my daughter and i saw it around the same exact time at night on the same street. except that time it was alot lower to the ground. while driving on the street, it looked as if we were driving towards stadium lights. they were very big and bright. we didn't hear any sound and it was hovering but moving very slowly. we pulled off the road to buckingham elementary school to investigate, but my daughter got kind of scared and convinced me to drive away. 

the other night i told my daughter that i had spotted the craft again in the same spot. and this actually triggered her to remember she had seen the same thing on the same night. however, she saw it on burnt house hill road. she said when she was driving she noticed something flying slowly in the sky and described it looking almost like a submarine. it was dark out yet she could see the whole shape or the craft and noticed lights on it as well. she only stopped for a second to look at it because she was on the phone so she disregarded it. however, she said to the person on the phone "what is that in the sky?" she then asked her friend if he remembered her saying that that night, and he did.
content.summary: Ufo flying high towards 413

content.detailedDescription: May 1996 on mark west springs rd i was driving in my car when an odd looking red glowing light low above a yellow globe of pulsating light. a black triangle was cut out of the dark sky .Ring of lights on the ship were different colors such as lavender, lime green, metalic beige, silvery  grey and specrum of colors which defy description. small flashes and sparking zig zag lights of reddish purple, black light hue and something resembling a camera flashed an eerie welding type light.It turn an inky black and then white neon like ring appeared on the bottom. then it blinked of within 2 seconds a theta shaped symbol blinked on. the ships size was 100 feet long. i could see a rectangular shape with rows of soft subdued lights barely visible to the naked eye. another ship appeared at 4:00 which was searching thru the trees lighting up a small area with sparkle dust and some of those purple and red black light cameras were sputtering off and on. when i intially saw this i thought a bug had spattered on my car window. when i crested the hill into calistoga i lost sight of it. i was angry that such infomation is obviously known and kept from the public by the powers that control our world.
content.summary: Ufo sighting between santa rosa and calistoga on mark west springs rd.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were playing basketball in my parking large area. i have a great view of the sky amongst the many pine and oak trees in the mountains where i live. i often see ufo's at night but the particular one was in daylight and it is the first one i videotaped. my son spotted it first and directed my attention to it. he had seen several ufo's as well as my family. he asked what it was. it was studied it for a moment and new it was a ufo. it looked like two 1/2 balls ontop each other with a very bright light dividing it. it was about 2:00 high and only about 6,000 to 8,000 feet above my house. it would have been a total of around 13,000 feet from sea level. i live about 5,500 feet in the san bernardino mountains. itseemed to float underneath a cloudlayer going west to east. i estimated, it to be aproximately 30 to 50 feet in circumference. at least it look that way at first until it started changing shape. then it flattend out some. i ran into the house to get my binoculars and video camera. i told my son to keep his eyes on it at all times while i did this. i was in the house for about a minute then ran out and looked to see it in my binoculars first. at that point the ufo traveled a good distance to the left and it was much smaller to the naked eye. i was dissapointed that i didn't have my camera sooner. in the binoculars it looked much different from when i first saw it. at first my son thought it was a giant hot air balloon because it has a dark middle and a dark bottom. i saw it the same way but it was perfectly round and had no bucket at the bottom whatsoever. it was a perfectly shaped sphere. the metal glowed from either itself or the reflection off the sun. because it was a little cloudy, i believe it glowed on its own accord. at times it looked like two ufo's, one on top of the other. i zoomed in on it with my video camera and began to tape it. i had trouble finding it again but then it came out of the clouds and i filmed it for about 6 seconds before it dissappeared into the cloud layer. it was deffinately was a silvery metalic on parts and the other parts looked like bright energy surges which exibited some unatural shapes. at one time it looked like a typical disk ufo with a domed top and domed bottom, then back to it's unusual shapes. when playing the tape in a frame by frame mode many details can be made out. it was amazing to say the least. i showed the tape to several people and they agree it was a ufo. i called bill ryan of ufo magazine and left several messages with him but he has not gotten back with me. this tape is as good as many other videos, perhaps better because it has target points of referrence. it also show clearly, it is not a balloon, plane , helicopter or anythang conventional. it made not sound and just seem to glide throught the sky.I have not been able to transfer the video to computer yet. i will attach a drawing of what it looked like when i first saw it. peter you have my # and left a message on my business phone. i have more other exciting stories to share with you if you like. one is a first hand account of a visit with two extraterestial beings that can be proven. my brother witnessed first hand the ufo's over the capital building while on vacation in new jersey in 1952. he had also seen severl others while in the army. my father has seen several and my mom has seen a ufo above our house in pennsylvania where i grew up. she said it looked like a chandlelair. my daughter at 3 years of age saw a blue disc shaped ufo fly right over our car. she said if she were 10 feet higher she could have touched it. she told me about it when it happened. i ran out but couldn't see anything. at 3 years old she said she could tell me in words what it was but that it was a large blue light coming down the street. later as an adult she was able to tell me exactly what she saw and this case is awesome because it had to do with warping the whole area around it as it came down the street. much more to these stories and others that will blow the average persons minds. i was fortunate enoungh to have had several encounters and then being aboard one with great conscience detail. i have also talked  stanton friedman and preston dennett about some of them. they wanted my story but i was hesitant to give it because of possibly writing a book about it. don't know if that will work out without some professional help. dennett offered to help but i haven't pursued it yet. i saw your 2 hour show several times and was impressed to write to you. please call back if you would like more details or would like to view the video. it would be well worth the time.
content.shape: Cylinder,  Disc,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: First spotted with my 14 year old son over our house. it started out spherical then morphed into different shapes. very clear but looked like a combination of several other sightings. very bright in some areas but metalic in others. no colored lights .

content.detailedDescription: On sun. june 22, 08 while at the beach in port aransas tx.  i was setting in my car - as my 2 teens were playing in the sand. i was reading, and looked up > at one of the frequent times of glancing at the children, and saw coming from right to left - in a straight line down the coastline - going right over the childrens head"s, a flying object - it moved slowly, and in a direct straight line - it made no noise. it was not a kite - or a remote controlled airplane, or craft/glider. this was something quite different.  this object looked exactly like the flying nuns hat off the old t.V. show "the flying nun - from the 60's. type in the search bar...Flying nun, and there you will see the shape of this object, (her hat). it was as an airplane like - but smaller, and as i watched it glyde past my childrens head and hover down the coastline, i honked to get the childrens attention, but they were some distance away, and with the waves crashing - they were unable to hear me, i got out of the car, and very rapidly began walking torward them, the object sped up, then... - it quickly vanished. all this happened within a minute or 2 at the most. this is a true story - no added details - or descriptions. i did not notice anyone looking up at this, as there were not many there, it was around 6:30 pm. i am very interested to find out what this may have been.
content.summary: This looked exactly like the flying nuns hat - the tv show from the 60's

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10 pm when i saw i moving star. it was really bright, as bright or brighter then the north star which was out too. but anyway it wasnt moving super quick or anything but it was moving at a good rate of speed and smoothly...Lost the thing over the tree line.
content.summary: Moving star

content.detailedDescription: I saw an object around 1:00 am the morning it was not lighting fast but it was moving at very fast speed.It was a red object with from time to time with  a white light flashing on top.Now this white light i saw could be just the lights from the firefly or lightining bugs.But all i no is that this thing had no sound and was a all red object shape was probably close to and orb like.
content.summary: Red object(white light flashing on top)?????

content.detailedDescription:
Ok so this is a strange subject to be getting into but if it will help in the study of what is out there well....
i was actually looking to see if i could see another of these moving stars,i guess that is what i will call them because that is what they look like to me.The first time i saw something was a mnth or so ago my fiancee,my son and my daughter and i were having abonfire in our backyard and my daughter noticed the moving star and pointed it out to all of us.My fiancee and my son saw something another night that my son said was shaped like a line or a jellybean also moving and lighted,the other night i watched this moving star until it reached another star then i couldnt pick it up anymore.I don't know if these are ufo's or what i just know they do not resemble planes satelites or anything else?I have had several strange sometimes disturbing dreams over the years regarding our visitors from the sky so sometimes i wonder if its just my overactive imagination making a mountain out of a mole hill,this is where u come in.The objects have seemed to move silently smoothly and the first one was rather quick not lightning bolt fast but at a good steady pace,considering the dreams i've had its a little scary but i still have a curiosity and awe...One dream i had was actually so vivid i wrote down everything,and actually drew pictures to descrbe where words failed so i have definately needed to get this off my chest...Thank you
content.summary: The object looked like a star was at what seemed to be the same height as stars

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my family a nephew his wife and son, was sitting on my front portch, looking for meteorites, it was ten til midnight and my nephew and his wife and children went home, everyone went to bed but myself and 9 year old son. at midnight, my son said he was going to bed and went into the house. i sat there gazing at the stars, i noticed my neighbor was washing dishes at her kitchen window, her outside entrance light was on and her kitchen light. my light were all on inside my house also. all other neighbors lights were off. there was one lamp post light on across the street to the right. the woman doing dishes was to my left. between these two houses was a large yard with a garden planted. it belong to the neigbor on the left.

down the street about a half a block i seen a fireball as big as the sun, yellow red orange fire turning clockwise, as the fire was turning counterclockwise. it went up into a arch as it crossed my street, when it reach tall trees i could not see it anymore. boy, i yelled at my son you just missed the biggest meteorite, you will ever see in your life. he yelled from the window from above the portch roof, mom i!M going to bed, it is gone now. i looked back at my neighbor doing dishes, as i did i heard a big bang like machinery breaking down. the sound and the flurecent aqua green floodlight hit the ground between the two houses across the street. filled up the intire yard, right up to the neighbors window. i was stunnd, and thought what is a helicopter doing here, but i heard no noise. next thing i notice was the street went dark the neighbors light went out in the kitchen and backdoor, the post lamp went off the transformer on the pole blew out for everyone on that side of the street. my electricty stay on.  i stepped off the portch and look down the street to my left toward the intersection two doors down, there in the sky about 80 to 70 feet in the air was a hugh lighted porthole with a beam coming out. i was not surprised at all. i remember saying, why are you in town sucking up my neigbors corn, when this is the corn belt of america. they could of took any road out of town and found corn.. then i went into the street and walked toward the craft. i had to see inside it before it took off. it was really an amazing event,it just hung there over my head making not a sound. i did not look to see if my neighbor had come out of her house, i was so wrapped up into what i was seeing.

the green floodlight came out to the right of the craft, which landed in the yard across the street. i told my self barney and betty was telling the truth. so don!T leave the street and you will not be in that beam. i knew from the corn, it could levitate. i guess i thought i was being smarter than they whoever they were. as i walked under it there was a circular room about 15 feet in diameter. and the wall was nothing but bright white light, so bright you could not see a structured wall. the light was the wall. as i turned and followed it with my eyes, i notice looking to the right side of a iron looking rim, i was looking through the green beam which was lighting up the under hang of the craft. just a small part, i even remember bending my knees think i may see it better, it was a dull grey but not smooth, it had rough bumps like knobs on it.

i had seen enough, and was coming to my senses, i got to get in my house. i keep saying stay in the street every two steps i turned around to make sure the light had not moved, i was finally getting scared. about my third turn around, i was looking up the beam, so i looked down at my feet, i was in the neighbors yard near the corn, i can!T explain what i felt, but i ran across the street in three leaps, yelling at my son, who i thought may still be awake, it had only been five mins. 

he did not answer so i went and utterly drug him downstairs, to the living room window. the beam was still there, as he got in front of me to look out the floodlight went out. i remember saying, oh, they were only here for my eyes. he ran to the door as i looked at the clock time, it was 3:35 and wont never forgot that second in the 36 years since. i ran to the door, he said lets see it take off. i put my body against the door and would not let him out. at the same time i was pressing my hands into both sides my head, saying thank you god, for making them put me back. i had four children and the nine year old was my oldest. my husband never believed me. he said i must of seen the search light from the airport. it was no use. i called the radio talk show the next day and ask if anyone had seen any thing usual in the sky last night. the radio man laughed and ask if i had seen any little green men. i bang the phone down, and new i would never be able to tell anyone. i did tell friends and family. i had a headache the next day that went on for years 33to be exact. i could not walk straight and could not tell the doctors what happen. i light up lights a few times in my living room while dusting end talbles, i remember that. finaly in 2006 i went into an mri and it showed i have white lesions on the left side of my brain. it controls the right side of my brain. the doctors said that is why you fall to the right. well i never told them what i thought cause it only the year when it started, which is a half truth. there is nothing they can do for it. they also said they do not know why or how it got there. i know, and that is all that matters. no one would believe me if i told them. i do not have ms, which, i knew that also, as after all these years i would of gotten worse. white lesions sometimes means ms. 

i never approched the lady across the street as she would of thought me a loony, also i did not know her personally. i know she had to come outdoors as the green was in her window where she stood in the house darkness from power loss. maybe they had her too, but memory of the craft was wash out of her head. that part they let me remember. some say it was so too much trauma and i dont want to remember. maybe so.  but i did have a dream about the craft 30 years later, i was inside the porthole turning looking at this wall of light, and it was like a florescent light but instead of bulbs, it was light flat slates of mirrors stuck together emitting this light. i could see the seam between the slates. but from the street, it looked be all one wall of light. i was so scared and told myself lois you have to wake up you cant go any farhter into this dream and i woke up, i did not sleep the rest of that night. i want to know and yet i dont. this is the truth the honest truth.

[witness name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Lighted porthole, room inside craft, grey dull metal, green floodlight

content.detailedDescription:
I was sky watching and was looking up and a bright light was coming from behind me (coming from west moving east) very fast, but very low - lower than a plane would fly over.  it was pretty cloudy and it was below the cloud line because it was clear as could be.  no cloud obstruction at all.  it was shaped like a v, the point of the v moving at the front, looked very fireballish, but it was pure bright light and there was no tail like you would see if something was on fire - it was illuminated and glowing, but not burning... all bright white.  it flew over my head and then angled to go south east from here.  i tried to get a better view with my binoculars, but it still looked exactly the same, not a defined crisp outline - because it was so bright and still looked like a v shape glowing pure white.  i was so amazed and was thinking wow, that was the best, and then i walked to the middle of the yard to see if there was anything else out there and i thought i heard a train in the distance and then omg a very low flying helicopter came out of nowhere right over my yard - actually right over my head - and headed in the exact same direction.  it was flying faster than i knew a helicopter could fly.  i know the helicopter saw me - how couldn't he as he went over me.  i thought to myself, that helicopter isn't going to catch that thing - and why did they send a helicopter to chase it?  because it was so low and a helicopter would bring less attention or because nothing else was around to go after it?   doesn't matter, i was sure he wasn't going to catch up to it anyway.  it was miraculous and amazing and an experience i'll never forget.  and it made no noise at all. completely silent.  if something like this was flying over during the daytime, no one would see it because it was so bright white.  the totally silent thing was neat, but the totally noisy fast helicopter was shocking.  i think that if anyone saw this thing they would probably think a meteor was crashing to earth, but like i said, there was no tail on this thing and the glow was almost fluorescent in how it was illuminated. 

looking over the left at the questions....  it was so smooth in its flight and i was so impressed with its appearance.  i actually after seeing the helicopter felt a little angry at the helicopter for chasing it.  what the heck, it was beautiful to see.  i came in the house to tell my son about it and asked him if he heard the helicopter in the yard and of course not, with the air conditioning on, no one can hear anything outside.  i looked around to the neighbors to see if they came out because the helicopter was so loud someone had to think something was going to crash into their house... but no, not a soul.  it's so humid and hot everyone has their air conditioning on.
content.summary: V-shaped bright white light came over yard followed a minute or so later by helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
My husband found these circle monday, july14th and called to see if i knew anything about them.  he was going into the horse arena to spread with our manure spreader when he noticed them.  i was home all weekend and did not hear anything out in the arena.  

the only thing that i can think back about that was unusual was that sometime late in the night on saturday, i woke up to find my lab pup up on the love seat in our bedroom looking out at the arena.  once i spoke to him, he just gave me a strange look and laid back down.  when there is someone or something on or near the property, he and my other dogs bark quite loudly.  he did not even growl!!!

the circles are approximately 20 ft. in diameter and approximately in the gound about 1-2 inches.  there are absolutely no tracks leading up to the arena from anywhere on or hear our property.  

if you would like pictures, i can send you an e-mail and also there is a video that a local tv station did on tuesday the 15th.  if you go on koat.Tv and type in the search engine "crop circles in east mountains" it will pull up the page with the segment that they did along with the aerial view of the arena.

you will see tire tracks in the arena, which was made by us with our manure spreader, but no other tracks can be found.
content.summary: 5 perfect round circles with circles inside each circle

content.detailedDescription: It was early spring i think in 1987 and it was a clear warm day. i was walking between a hotel and the 401 in brockville ontario, i had a feeling i was not alone so i looked up and was surprised to see an object at an altitude of about 2000 to 3000 ft. it changet shape from a circle to a star which may be an optical illusion because it was bright, glowing, colour chageing object and as it changed colour it may have appeared to change shape to a star. ir changed colour from red to blue to white and then greeni layed down on the ground to watch this strange object and i am not sure how much time elapsed but it would cjange colour and brightness but it was not moving but it was hovering.I found myself strangly calm about the whole thing which was unusual due to my negative reactions to ufo shows, i ussually get anxious and fearful but in this insident i was calm i think i even fell asleep that is why i am not sure how much time lapsed i put the encounter at about 60 mins but am not really sure. the next thing that happened was 2 f15 eagles flew up and started climbing towards the object. at that point the object moved off at speeds that were far faster than that of the f15"s trying to approach it. i have told few people but i was not the only witness. i pointed the object out to at least 4 other people at that time but they were in to much of a rush to watch the object, they would just comment how strange it looked
content.summary: It was a bright glowing colour and shape chaging object.

content.detailedDescription: All red object flashing occasional white on top....Fast moving object seen flying over tree line to tree line then disapearing over tree line. scary!!!
content.summary: All red object flashing white occasional

content.detailedDescription:
the early morning of july16 , i woke up at 4h50am planing doing a day fishing trip^with my friend. like each day i go put my dog outside and check for the newspaper. but something caught my attention  just over my neighbour house.  its a red white glow star like, direction west,south-west. the size of the object is 25cen coin. its the only light on sky its a cloudy  sunset morning so i could see any star in sky but i see that light away. 

i go inside take my cam put in on night vision mode and film it for about 3-4min. then i switch on normal mode to see difference between mode, suddendly the light fade, could see nothing. i run on my backyard with a large view north, north east. after 20-30sec off scanning the sky  my ufo show back from a cloud become very bright only white this time.Start moving up on the other cloud for hiding with a strange pattern a helicopter or plane cant do. i see nothing after that.


with my job am doing about flying each year on chopper like astar, md530 its not what i saw.


if someone around  have seeing the same object please report it. its same to be all on north east cost.
content.summary: Star-like  ufo show up early before sunrise

content.detailedDescription:
We noticed 3 at first, we watched 2 leave the sky in a fire fly type motion. it would be very bright, then go dull and appear farther down the sky again.

one of the coolest events that happend was, the 3rd object that stayed for over an hour, whilst it was moving around from left/right and up/down very randomly, it moved so fast and akwardly that to our vision it looked sorta like a lightning bolt for a split second. me and my friend both witness these events aswell.

often at times, the object would fade right out so that you could not see it. another amazing event was, we noticed the object flash, then it showed a red, then blue light im a strange pattern, then we seen another object appear beside it then shoot off into the sky.

myself witnessed, the object emitting a lightning like light beside the object that happend a few times, and the color of this light was blue and white. my friend did not witness that part.

instead of the clips, i will attach my youtube profile wich has all 3 clips i have. the clips were not on the same date as the above desription. the vidoes were on the 17th and 18th of july. all videos were filmed in london ontario. 

i must add, if you guys have anyone in london, or close by. i can garentee 100% they will see ufos in the clear sky at night. i apologize for the video quality, they were filmed with a pretty bad digital camera. but they are 100% geniune, i have a witness to back it up. 

http://www.Youtube.Com/shawnold
content.summary: Looked like northern star but had red/blue huge and lots of movement
